/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, their colors muted under the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a distance, allowing for a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings.
